description: Information related to the networking layer of Substrate

targets.expr: max(${metric_namespace}_sub_libp2p_out_events_notifications_sizes{instance=~"${nodename}", protocol="${notif_protocol}", action="sent"} - ignoring(action) ${metric_namespace}_sub_libp2p_out_events_notifications_sizes{instance=~"${nodename}", protocol="${notif_protocol}", action="received"}) by (instance) > 0

panels.title: Total sizes of notifications waiting to be delivered to the rest of Substrate

targets.expr: sum(rate(${metric_namespace}_sub_libp2p_notifications_sizes_sum{instance=~"${nodename}", protocol="${notif_protocol}"}[5m])) by (direction, protocol) / sum(rate(${metric_namespace}_sub_libp2p_notifications_sizes_count{instance=~"${nodename}", protocol="${notif_protocol}"}[5m])) by (direction, protocol)

panels.title: Average size of sent and received notifications in the past 5 minutes

panels.description: 99.9% of the time, the output queue size for this protocol is below the given value
panels.title: 99th percentile of queues sizes
Maximum size of sent and received notifications in the past 5 minutes
Average transport-level (TCP, QUIC, ...) connections per node
Number of incoming connection errors, averaged by node

panels.description: Each bucket represent a certain number of nodes using a certain bandwidth range.
panels.title: Heatmap of network bandwidth
Dialing attempt errors, averaged per node
GrandPa messages received from the network, and action
Distribution over number of entries in k-buckets

targets.legendFormat: Number of Kademlia random queries started per minute on all nodes

panels.title: Number of Kademlia discovery queries per minute on all nodes combined
Number of Kademlia records (average/min/max per node)
Total size of Kademlia records (average/min/max per node)
Authority discovery Kademlia queries in progress, averaged per node
Authority discovery publications, averaged per node

title: Substrate Networking
